title: fathafraink
author: fathafraink
content: Hello friends, this time I will tell you how to mine $BANANO (BAN) tokens. Regarding complete information about Banano, friends can click on the following Cmc link: https://coinmarketcap.com/id/currencies/banano/How to Mine $BANANO Using CPU or GPU:1. First we must have a Banano Wallet, friends, please register at the following link: https://vault.banano.cc/- Create New Wallet- After successfully creating a wallet, don't forget to save MNEMONIC PHRASE and BANANO SEED in Notepad (preferably not in Notepad Online, must be offline and stored safely on your computer, try not to be seen someone else), after you save it, then click "I'VE SAVED MY SEED/MNEMONIC" like the following example:- Then enter a password that is easy for you to remember (you also need to record it in Notepad like before)- Now then, click menu "Accounts"- And click the following button (to copy the address or addresses that we have created)- After copying our address, please open the site bananominer.com- Then Paste or paste the address that we copied earlier, and then click "Start Now"- And later you will get "NAME" and "Team Number", then click "Start Folding" (note it, later we will use it for the Mining process)- Then you will be directed to the foldingathome.org site, then you please click on section "fah-installer.exe" as shown below:And automatically you will download the application in the exe format, please wait until it's finished, friends.2. Secondly, we will install fah-installer.exe which we finished downloading earlier, friends.- Please open the downloaded fah-installer.exe:- Then click "Next"- Click "I Agree"- Then click "Next"- Finally, click "Finish"And after clicking finish, don't forget to check the PRIVATE NETWORKS and PUBLIC NETWORKS sections and then click "ALLOW ACCESS"- Now then your browser will automatically open the client on the foldingathome.org site, then you please click "Change Identity" :- Then enter NAME and TEAM NUMBER according to what you noted earlier:OR Friends, you can also click configuration via the FAH-CLIENT.EXE application that was installed earlier, by right-clicking on the FAH or FoldingAtHome icon (as shown) then clicking "Advanced Control" , then clicking "Configure".- Then click on the tab/menu section "Identity" and please enter the NAME and TEAM NUMBER that you have noted down.3. Third, we will run Mining or Mining, friends.- Return to the FAHControl section, then on the Folding Power menu tab, please click and drag to the "FULL" section (as shown below):- Then lastly, click the "FOLD" Tab to start the Mining or Mining process.In my experience mining BANANO, usually BANANO tokens or coins will immediately enter our wallet address. After our mining process is successful up to 100%, whether it's using the CPU or GPU. To see what percentage of our Mining process has been running, please look at Web Control or FAHControl, friends.NOTE : I will update the following Tutorial if there is an update or new information is obtained. And, I will be making Tutorial videos as well as I have done for other threads I have created, but I need some time to make them. If you want to ask something, please, friends, I will immediately reply to all of your questions regarding Mining $Banano.

comments.author: Porfirii
comments.body: Thank you for this tutorial fathafraink! I knew about Banano almost three years ago and I got a little airdrop (currently worth >$2). I thought that this project was dead, but I'm glad to see that it still has activity. Keep up the good work!BTW, is there also an installer for Mac, or only mining in Windows is planned?

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: I love the idea of rewarding Banano tokens for using Folding@home and supporting such a well-known and large project, but how much profit will you get from mining?If the profit is low, then it is not interesting for many miners, because mining has certain costs and cannot work with losses.

comments.author: fathafraink
comments.body: Quote from: Porfirii on June 14, 2023, 10:43:49 AMThank you for this tutorial fathafraink! I knew about Banano almost three years ago and I got a little airdrop (currently worth >$2). I thought that this project was dead, but I'm glad to see that it still has activity. Keep up the good work!BTW, is there also an installer for Mac, or only mining in Windows is planned?Your Welcome @Porfirii, and thanks to reply for asking a question.Quote from: Porfirii on June 14, 2023, 10:43:49 AMBTW, is there also an installer for Mac, or only mining in Windows is planned?Yes, there is also an installer for Mac for Mac 10.7+, and also for other os, here we can see : https://foldingathome.org/alternative-downloads/?lng=en-USQuote from: FP91G on June 14, 2023, 04:39:33 PMI love the idea of rewarding Banano tokens for using Folding@home and supporting such a well-known and large project, but how much profit will you get from mining?If the profit is low, then it is not interesting for many miners, because mining has certain costs and cannot work with losses.I have no data about if the mining is profit or not, so I hope anyone who has data about their mining of this coin want to share it.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: fathafraink on June 15, 2023, 01:58:13 PMQuote from: FP91G on June 14, 2023, 04:39:33 PMI love the idea of rewarding Banano tokens for using Folding@home and supporting such a well-known and large project, but how much profit will you get from mining?If the profit is low, then it is not interesting for many miners, because mining has certain costs and cannot work with losses.I have no data about if the mining is profit or not, so I hope anyone who has data about their mining of this coin want to share it.Do you write your Mining Tutorial based on your experience or do you use information from the internet?This token is very cheap, and the reward for activity must be large in order to pay off the work of the mining farm.https://banano.cc/https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/banano/markets/I don't use windows for mining.

comments.author: fathafraink
comments.body: Quote from: FP91G on June 15, 2023, 02:20:02 PMDo you write your Mining Tutorial based on your experience or do you use information from the internet?This token is very cheap, and the reward for activity must be large in order to pay off the work of the mining farm.https://banano.cc/https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/banano/markets/I don't use windows for mining.I used to mining this token, but I forgot the estimation income about this mining.Not only for windows, but also able to do mining in other os which was provided.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: fathafraink on June 20, 2023, 08:34:03 AMQuote from: FP91G on June 15, 2023, 02:20:02 PMDo you write your Mining Tutorial based on your experience or do you use information from the internet?This token is very cheap, and the reward for activity must be large in order to pay off the work of the mining farm.https://banano.cc/https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/banano/markets/I don't use windows for mining.I used to mining this token, but I forgot the estimation income about this mining.Not only for windows, but also able to do mining in other os which was provided.When did you receive the reward in these tokens?This token looks like a dead man.I would make guides for forward looking coins like CFX that have been pumped recently. CFX mining is also very risky now, but more profitable than BANANO mining.

comments.author: fathafraink
comments.body: Quote from: FP91G on June 21, 2023, 06:11:43 PMWhen did you receive the reward in these tokens?Well,Suddenly and Fortunately I just found one of my wallet, and here you can check the data, it began in 11/19/2021 :  - https://creeper.banano.cc/account/ban_3cyogi1pgoahsuyss9paa8ze8j7sf15egqdohnarz1kjtmarts3whm6xn6hy

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: fathafraink on June 21, 2023, 07:10:13 PMQuote from: FP91G on June 21, 2023, 06:11:43 PMWhen did you receive the reward in these tokens?Well,Suddenly and Fortunately I just found one of my wallet, and here you can check the data, it began in 11/19/2021 :  - https://creeper.banano.cc/account/ban_3cyogi1pgoahsuyss9paa8ze8j7sf15egqdohnarz1kjtmarts3whm6xn6hyDid you sell 169 coins at 1 cent each? For 2 years you have mined a bottle of lemonade  You will not earn profit on such mining. If this is not the main wallet, then I was right that the profit is very small. Maybe you should write about other coins with the most video cards in mining?

comments.author: fathafraink
comments.body: Quote from: FP91G on June 22, 2023, 04:06:54 PMQuote from: fathafraink on June 21, 2023, 07:10:13 PMQuote from: FP91G on June 21, 2023, 06:11:43 PMWhen did you receive the reward in these tokens?Well,Suddenly and Fortunately I just found one of my wallet, and here you can check the data, it began in 11/19/2021 :  - https://creeper.banano.cc/account/ban_3cyogi1pgoahsuyss9paa8ze8j7sf15egqdohnarz1kjtmarts3whm6xn6hyDid you sell 169 coins at 1 cent each? For 2 years you have mined a bottle of lemonade  You will not earn profit on such mining. If this is not the main wallet, then I was right that the profit is very small. Maybe you should write about other coins with the most video cards in mining?I said "One of my wallet", so there were adresses before, But I forgot where they were. A few years ago, it's really profitable, because I mined it before Bitcoin Price goes up in 2021, and when Bitcoin Price goes up, so I sell my Banano Token in high price.
